MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH12 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in South Gyle Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.18am. Our engineers have arrived onsite and confirmed this has been caused by 3rd party damage to our underground cable network outside 2 South Gyle Park. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.08am on the 16th of November 2020.
